meanings.definition: A sudden loud cry or exclamation, especially of fear or surprise.
meanings.sent1: The booh from the haunted house scared me.
meanings.sent2: Her booh echoed through the quiet night.
meanings.sent3: The little girl's booh startled her cat.
meanings.sent4: The booh of the thunderstorm shook the windows.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected booh made everyone jump.

meanings.definition: To make a sudden loud cry or exclamation, especially of fear or surprise.
meanings.sent1: Don't booh loudly in the library.
meanings.sent2: She likes to booh when watching scary movies.
meanings.sent3: The comedian tried to booh for laughs.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks boohed in the sky.
meanings.sent5: He will booh to get attention.
